Adhesion.title: Support Membership for our actions
Adhesion.subtitle: Membership form to return to us or online membership via HelloAsso
Adhesion.description: The association under the law of 1901 Jardin Nature Pibrac was published in the Official Journal in 2013. It is registered under the SIRET number 797 528 148 00019 Category 9220. Membership entitles you to a tax reduction because the association is recognized as being of general interest by tax ruling dated 21/02/2014 and therefore meets the general conditions provided for in articles 200 and 238 bis of the General Tax Code. You can deduct 66% of your donation within the limit of 20% of your taxable income.
Adhesion.note: Online membership by following the Link or the Helloasso QRCode below

next_conference.title: Jardin Nature de Pibrac Agenda
next_conference.description: The presentation will be led by Marie-Pia Marchant, a third-year doctoral student at the University of Toulouse, co-supervised by Georges Zissis (LAPLACE Laboratory - Physics of Light) and Dr. Luc Legal, Senior Lecturer at the CRBE (Center for Research on Biodiversity and Environment). A fascinating topic on the impact of light pollution on biodiversity. Discover how artificial lighting, by disrupting the natural cycle of day and night, modifies the behaviors, interactions, and reproduction of living species. It will also be an opportunity to explore the diversity and beauty of moths, these often invisible but essential creatures to our ecosystems, as well as to take a broader look at the impact of this light pollution on different groups of animals and plants.
